com.here.platform.location.core.geospatial.javadsl

Interface BoundingBoxHolder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoundingBox, RectangleLocation

    public interface BoundingBoxHolder
    Represents objects that are a bounding box.

    When using types that implement this interface, other parts of the API will work out-of-the-box. If a type doesn't implement it, a BoundingBoxAdapter might need to be provided instead.
